first.description: First name of debtor if search type is INDIVIDUAL_DEBTOR.

second.description: Second/middle name or initial of debtor if search type is INDIVIDUAL_DEBTOR.

last.description: Last name of debtor if search type is INDIVIDUAL_DEBTOR.

business.description: Business name of debtor if search type is BUSINESS_DEBTOR.

criteria.description: The criteria of the search - the value to search on. Provide either value or debtorName. The criteria must match the type.

value.description: The search string.  Can be the serial number, DOT number, VIN number, etc.

type.description: The type of search to execute.

clientReferenceId.description: An optional client reference identifier associated with a change. Provided to facilitate client tracking of PPR activity.

startDateTime.description: Optionally limit the search date range by specifying a search start date and time. This timestamp must be in the past and earlier than endDateTime.

endDateTime.description: Optionally limit the search date range by specifying a search end date and time. This timestamp must be in the past and later than startDateTime. If endDateTime is not present then the end timestamp is the system date and time at the time of the search.
